citeinfo.origin: National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), National Marine Fisheries Service (NMFS)
citeinfo.title: The Bering Sea Connection (The US/USSR Marine Mammal project)

abstract.p: Within the last two years, joint research activities under the US/USSR Marine Mammal project have taken an exciting turn in the opening of Soviet coastal regions to research by American scientists. Before 1988, American scientists rarely were allowed to visit Soviet coastal regions to conduct research.
[Reference: Miller, R.V. 1990. The Bering Sea connection: the U.S./U.S.S.R. Marine Mammal Project. Alaska's Wildl. 22(5): 7-10.]
This volume may be found at many university libraries.

descript.purpose: A report on a joint research between the US and USSR on Marine Mammals, called the Bering Sea Connection.
